meaning_str.bing:
n. 热；温度；压力；激动
v. 加热；变热；（使）变暖
网络. 盗火线；热度；热火

高温；热度；热能；激情；激动；愤怒；强烈的情绪；炎热天气；热的环境；辣味；预赛；热量单位；发热状态；热潮；（动物的）交配期
加热（物体）；使变暖；激发（情绪、兴趣等）；加剧（竞争、争论等）

1.en: Barbara says that the heat collection system allows her to enjoy many hours of energy-free laundry.
1.cn: 巴巴拉说，集中热源的系统，让她能享受多小时的无能量洗衣。

2.en: The Heat sleepwalk through some games, look like world-beaters in others and seem to be biding their time until the playoffs.
2.cn: 季后赛到来之前，他们在一些比赛中梦游，在另一些比赛中又像是主宰，似乎在等待时机。

3.en: Germany and ourselves have great respect for each other and this was a thing in the heat of the moment.
3.cn: 德国和我们都非常的尊敬对方，而这只是激情的一刻。

0.en: You know, when you freeze to death, the last thing you feel is extreme heat.
0.cn: 当人被冻死的时候最后会感觉到非常热。

1.en: No, I got really hot in my leather pants so I took them off but they must have shrunk from the sweat or something or my legs expanded from the heat.
1.cn: 不是，我觉得皮裤很热，就进来脱掉，结果它一定是遇汗缩水，或是我的腿因热膨胀。

2.en: Yes, I know, you're too smart for this. Exactly. It's like asking the Human Torch to heat up your frozen burrito.
2.cn: 是是是，太大材小用了。没错，就跟叫霹雳火来热你的冷冻玉米煎饼一样。

3.en: A black hole's accretion disk is made up of gas and dust and magnetic fields that spin at high speeds radiating heat and light.
3.cn: 黑洞的吸积盘是由气体、尘埃和磁场组成，并以高速旋转发射出光和热。

4.en: Well, admittedly, this brushes up against my well-known aversions to heat, small places, going below floor-level, dampness, hatches, ladders, darkness, echoes, and eliminating in Home Depot buckets.
4.cn: 不可否认，此举触及到了我所有广为人知的死穴，怕热、怕狭窄、怕往地下走、怕湿、 怕舱口、怕梯子、怕黑、怕回声，还有怕在塑料桶里排泄。

5.en: That is what we call the heat death of the universe.
5.cn: 那就是我们所说的宇宙热寂说。

6.en: 25 grams of butter. Now all of this goes on the heat.
6.cn: 25克的黄油，所有这些都要加热一下。

7.en: If things heat up, you only need an hour of sex to burn off 200 calories.
7.cn: 打得火热的话，只需要一小时的爱爱来燃烧200大卡。

8.en: No. He cut open a tauntaun and used its internal body heat to warm him up.
8.cn: 没有，他切开一只圣兽用它内部的体热给他取暖。

9.en: Your head would hit the ceiling when you hit a pothole. And the heat never worked.
9.cn: 车开过坑，颠一下，你的头就会撞到车顶，暖气永远不制热。

10.en: Where is the fire, Daddy? Nearly there. Hurray! Easy as pie! Now we can heat up the tomato soup.
10.cn: 火在哪里呀，爸爸？就快有了。好嘞！小菜一碟！现在我们可以加热番茄汤啦。

11.en: So, all I want to do is cook this now on a gentle heat. Let it simmer, take on all those flavors.
11.cn: 我现在用文火加热，慢慢炖，将香味炖出来。

12.en: The waters absorb the solar heat that the ice used to reflect back. This phenomenon is amplified.
12.cn: 原来被冰面反射的热能现在被海水吸收，温室效应被不断放大。

13.en: The heat leaving my body. The blood in my veins. I can feel my brain. The deepest parts of my memory.
13.cn: 我身体散发的热能，我血管流动的血液，我可以感受到大脑最深层的记忆。

14.en: Escape the heat and enter a world of color at the Singapore Botanic Gardens and National Orchid Garden.
14.cn: 在缤纷的新加坡植物园和新加坡国家胡姬园，能让人避开炎热的天气。

15.en: Then you two can sneak into the cockpit, and things will start to heat up, and then a stewardess comes in.
15.cn: 然后你们可以溜进驾驶舱，气氛开始变得火热，然后一个空姐进来…

16.en: Whoa, this place is hot! Oh, yes, it is. Do you ever get used to the heat? Well, some people do. I haven't yet.
16.cn: 哇!这里太热了是的,确实你习惯了这里的高温吗? 有些人习惯了,我还没有习惯。

17.en: Solving that problem was Nucor's big breakthrough. The secret, they discovered, lay in the most basic part of the process, heat.
17.cn: 这个问题的解决是纽柯的重大突破，他们发现的秘密就是依靠造钢的核心环节,加热。

18.en: Okay? So as long as it's hot onstage you got nothing to worry about. It's when the heat goes away, that's when you're in trouble.
18.cn: 只要台上很火热，你就不必担心，热度不见了才麻烦。

19.en: Back onto the wok, now. So, I'm going to heat the mushrooms, and it's going to be cooking in the oil that's had all the flavors from the meat.
19.cn: 再次架上锅，将香菇加热，在刚才的油中煸炒会让香菇带上肉的味道。
